
test_if_missing Test if the input is Missing

####  Description 

Test if the input is Missing

####  Usage 
<pre><code>

test_if_missing(x)
</code></pre>
#### Arguments 

x object

#### Value 

an error if input (x) is not specified

#### Examples 
```{r}

## Not run:
# success
my_test <- x
test_if_null(my_test)
#fail
test_if_missing()
## End(Not run)
test_if_null 89
